Node control¶

Connection¶

class CloudConnection(config, connect=True)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class serves as a connection to the openstack deployment.

Variables

ansible – AnsibleRunner object which serves as an interface for running Ansible tasks on the target

deployment. :type ansible:class AnsibleRunner: :ivar hosts: Dictionary containing the hosts on the deployment ( Key->value = host_ip-> host_object) :type hosts: dict :ivar cluster: Object representing the cluster. :type cluster: class: AnsibleRunner :ivar network_d: drivers.NetworkDriver for performing networking tasks on the deployment. :type network_d: class:.drivers.NetworkDriver :ivar cont_d: drivers.DockerContainer driver for performing container related tasks on the deployment. :type cont_d: class:.drivers.DockerContainer :ivar host_d: drivers.HostDriver for performing tasks on the hosts. :type host_d: drivers.HostDriver :ivar cloud_d: drivers.DeploymentDriver for performing tasks on the deployment. :type cloud_d: class:.drivers.DeploymentDriver :param config: Json configuration for the deployment. See cloud_config.json for example. :type config: dict :param connect: Whether to connect to the deployment on object creation. :type connect: bool

get_target(target, host=None, id=None, name=None)[source]¶

Parameters

  • name (str, optional) – Target name
